title: Vision-Oriented Pitch
content: Start with your vision, describe the change you want to see, explain how your product makes it happen, show who benefits, and end with how you’ll grow.

title: Problem-Solution-Impact Format
content: Define the problem → Show your unique solution → Explain the real-world impact → Share key metrics or proof points → Ask for support/funding.

title: Hero's Journey Pitch
content: Introduce the customer as the hero → Present the problem as a villain → Show your solution as a guide → Highlight the transformation → Invite to join the mission.

title: Elevator Pitch Template
content: For [target audience] who [pain point], our [product/service] offers [key benefit]. Unlike [competitor], we [unique differentiator].

title: Scientific Pitch Structure
content: Background → Hypothesis (what you believed) → Experiment (what you built) → Results (impact so far) → Conclusion (why it works).

title: Problem-Market-Solution-Traction
content: What’s broken → How big the market is → How you’re solving it → Proof that it’s working (revenue, users, partners).

title: Pitch as a Story Arc
content: Set the scene → Introduce conflict (problem) → Present your hero (solution) → Show journey/results → End with a hopeful future (your ask).

title: Reverse Pyramid Pitch
content: Start with the punchline (what your startup does best) → Drill into the problem → Unfold how you solve it → Back it with data → Conclude with next steps.

title: Lean Startup Pitch
content: Customer segment → Problem → Solution → Unique Value Proposition → Channels → Revenue streams → Ask.

title: Investor-Focused Pitch
content: Big problem → Scalable solution → Market potential → Business model → Team credentials → Financial forecast → Investment needs.
